LanguageData.VFEM_Wine.label: wine
LanguageData.VFEM_Wine.description: A large bottle of a strong alcoholic beverage that is made from fermented grapes. Excessive consumption can lead to alcohol blackouts and, over time, addiction.
LanguageData.VFEM_Wine.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.VFEM_Wine.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.VFEM_Must.label: grape must
LanguageData.VFEM_Must.description: Un-fermented wine. This substance needs to ferment in a wine barrel before it becomes drinkable wine.
LanguageData.VFEM_Candle.label: candle
LanguageData.VFEM_Candle.description: A primitive candle made from meat and fat. It can burn for a long time, but it does not light up the area well.
LanguageData.VFEM_WallTorchLamp.label: wall-mounted torch lamp
LanguageData.VFEM_WallTorchLamp.description: A wall-mounted wooden torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Produces a small amount of heat.
LanguageData.VFEM_ArcheryTarget.label: archery target
LanguageData.VFEM_ArcheryTarget.description: A simple archery target. It's relaxing, and trains shooting skills.
LanguageData.VFEM_WineBarrel.label: wine barrel
LanguageData.VFEM_WineBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting raw must into wine.
LanguageData.VFEM_MeatSmoker.label: meat smoker
LanguageData.VFEM_MeatSmoker.description: A small wooden box that needs to be refueled with wood periodically. Meat of any kind gets inserted into it and then gets smoked to last longer.
LanguageData.VFEM_CobblestoneWall.label: cobblestone wall
LanguageData.VFEM_LowRockWall.label: low rock wall
LanguageData.VFEM_LowRockWall.description: A waist high chunk wall. Very sturdy.
LanguageData.VFEM_SmokedMeat.label: smoked meat
LanguageData.VFEM_SmokedMeat.description: A piece of meat preserved by smoking. Tastes good. It lasts a long time without refrigeration. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.VFEM_RawGrapes.label: grapes
LanguageData.VFEM_RawGrapes.description: Raw grapes. Nice to eat, even when raw. Grapes can also be made into must which can then be used to make wine.
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_PlateHelmetLight.label: light plate helmet
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_PlateHelmetLight.descriptio: A lightweight medieval helmet that provides moderate protection against sharp attacks. Not effective against blunt weapons. Slighty restricts the wearer's field of vision.
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_PlateHelmetHeavy.label: heavy plate helmet
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_PlateHelmetHeavy.descriptio: A bulky medieval helmet that provides full-head coverage. Offers a considerable amount of protection but restricts the wearer's field of vision.
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_JesterHat.label: jester hat
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_JesterHat.description: A hat worthy of a jester. Each half is different from the other one in color.
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_DameHat.label: dame hat
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_DameHat.description: A beautiful long cone hat for a dame.
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_KingsCrown.label: king's crown
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_KingsCrown.description: A beautiful metal crown. The wearer becomes very influential, but at the same time they will refuse to do any work.
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_PlagueMask.label: plague mask
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_PlagueMask.description: A mask with a long ‘beak’ filled with herbal medicine that keeps infected pawns at a distance.
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_PlateArmorHeavy.label: heavy plate armor
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_PlateArmorHeavy.description: Overlapping solid plates of armor covering the entire body from neck to feet. The plates have been reinforced which offers significantly more protection, but at the cost of mobility.
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_Tabard.label: tabard
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_Tabard.description: A garment that is worn over armour by medieval militia which depicts their kingdom's coat of arms.
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_JesterOutfit.label: jester outfit
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_JesterOutfit.description: A colorful jester outfit. It predisposes to conversation, but it's impossible to learn anything in such a suit.
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_DameDress.label: dame dress
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_DameDress.description: A beautiful full body dress for a dame. Wearing such clothes will inevitably lead to getting used to luxury, so the user will not be capable of dumb labor.
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_KingsRobes.label: king’s robes
LanguageData.VFEM_Apparel_KingsRobes.description: A long robe with golden chestplate, worthy of a king. Extremely beautiful.
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Kite.tools.0.label: base
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Kite.tools.1.label: centre
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Kite.label: kite shield
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Kite.description: A large wooden shield, with the front decoratively covered by leather. Offers a moderate amount of protection against melee and ranged attacks.
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Heater.tools.0.label: base
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Heater.tools.1.label: centre
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Heater.label: heater shield
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Heater.description: A heavy medium-sized steel shield, with the front decoratively covered by leather. Offers a significant amount of protection against melee and ranged attacks.
LanguageData.VFEM_MeleeWeapon_Claymore.label: claymore
LanguageData.VFEM_MeleeWeapon_Claymore.description: An ancient two-handed weapon, very rarely seen in use on the rim. Very effective at slashing and stabbing.
LanguageData.VFEM_MeleeWeapon_Claymore.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VFEM_MeleeWeapon_Claymore.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.VFEM_MeleeWeapon_Claymore.tools.2.label: edge
LanguageData.VFEM_MeleeWeapon_HeavyMace.label: heavy mace
LanguageData.VFEM_MeleeWeapon_HeavyMace.description: A heavy mace consisting of a shaft and a heavy ball adorned with spikes. Very effective at piercing plate armor, this weapon is often used by more vicious knights and mercenaries.
LanguageData.VFEM_MeleeWeapon_HeavyMace.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VFEM_MeleeWeapon_HeavyMace.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.VFEM_Bow_HeavyCrossbow.label: heavy crossbow
LanguageData.VFEM_Bow_HeavyCrossbow.description: A heavy crossbow has a similar principle to a bow, consisting of a bow-like assembly mounted horizontally on a sturdy frame, which is handheld in a similar fashion to the stock of a long gun.\n\nThis heavy bolt thrower fires devastating bolts, capable of piercing several layers of metal.
LanguageData.VFEM_Bow_HeavyCrossbow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.VFEM_Arrow_HeavyBolt.label: heavy crossbow bolt
LanguageData.VFEM_Plant_Grape.label: grape plant
LanguageData.VFEM_Plant_Grape.description: A medium-sized vine that yields grapes when harvested - an essential ingredient in the production of wine that also tastes nice when eaten raw. Takes a long time to initially grow but can be harvested repeatedly in a single lifespan.
LanguageData.VFEM_Plant_TreeHealroot.label: healroot tree
LanguageData.VFEM_Plant_TreeHealroot.description: A tree that produces healroot, genetically engineered to disinfect its own product, and survive in slightly less-warm climates.
